data: `minecraft:behavior.ocelotattack` allows an entity to attack by sneaking and pouncing.

data.Name: max_distance
data.Description: Max distance from the target, this entity will use this attack behavior.

data.Name: max_sneak_range
data.Description: Max distance from the target, this entity starts sneaking.

data.Name: max_sprint_range
data.Description: Max distance from the target, this entity starts sprinting (sprinting takes priority over sneaking).

data.Name: reach_multiplier
data.Description: Used with the base size of the entity to determine minimum target-distance before trying to deal attack damage.

data.Name: sneak_speed_multiplier
data.Description: Modifies the attacking entity's movement speed while sneaking.

data.Name: sprint_speed_multiplier
data.Description: Modifies the attacking entity's movement speed while sprinting.

data.Name: walk_speed_multiplier
data.Description: Modifies the attacking entity's movement speed when not sneaking or sprinting, but still within attack range.

data.Name: x_max_rotation
data.Description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

data.Name: y_max_head_rotation
data.Description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the Y-axis, this entity can rotate its head while trying to look at the target.
